title: [Self-directed] Fundamentals of Multimedia Search Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming concepts, linear algebra, probability theory, and data structures
context.additional_context: Requires responsive content design considering smartphone-based learning environments. Educational curriculum emphasizing mathematical modeling and algorithm comprehension

learning_goals: They can explain the relationship between multimedia data characteristics and search requirements using a mathematical model
They can design methods to improve search efficiency by over 20% using hyperparameter optimization techniques
They analyze the operating principles of reinforcement learning-based parameter adaptation systems and apply them to simple problems

resources: Open-source machine learning library access environment
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
